languages.custom: Telepathy 60 ft., understands Common but can’t speak

description.value:
The kraken makes three tentacle attacks. One of them can be replaced with a bite attack, and any of them can be replaced with Fling.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, and the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

One Medium or smaller object held or creature &Reference[grappled]{grappled} by the kraken’s tentacles is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes [[/damage 1d6 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a [[/save dex 16 format=long]] or take the same damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The kraken creates three bolts of &Reference[lightning]{lightning}, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 150 feet of it. A target must make a [[/save dex 16 format=long]], taking [[/damage 3d10 type=lightning average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Amphibious. The kraken can breathe air and water.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Siege Monster. The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
